name: Brawlquest (itch)
description:
This is a turn based exploration RPG! Explore the lands and fight monsters with your crew of buds.

This is probably the most ambitious game I ever made in a game jam, and the result is a big ol mess. An interesting mess though, give it a shot!

You explore a procedurally generated world map and encounter creatures and monsters. Creatures encountered can be negociated, traded with, or even recruited! Battles are chaotic AI-controlled brawls between the two groups! There is a lot of needless complexity underlying the combat, I probably could have kept it much more simple, but it was a lot of fun to figure out.

Game made by Francis Coulombe, with music by Babu Oji!
